lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Philippines' restructuring of 13.2 billion dlrs of foreign debt will provide a welcome boost for the economy, but last Friday's accord with the country's 12-bank advisory committee does not imply an overnight boom, bankers and businessmen polled by Reuters said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Aurelio Periquet, President of the Philippine Chamber of Commerce and Industry, told Reuters the debt accord had positively translated the international banking community's confidence in the country's economy and Aquino's government.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The successful negotiations form an important piece in the mosaic," Christian Roeher, Secretary-General of the European Chamber of Commerce, said.
